definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: River is the ultimate receiving water of the urban wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 河流是城市污水的最終受納體。

sentences.english: Urban sewage treatment has doubled since 2001.
sentences.chinese: 從2001年以來，城市污水處理率提高了一倍。

sentences.english: Sewage systems continue to overflow, forcing many beaches to close.
sentences.chinese: 污水系統仍舊不堪重負，導致許多湖灘被迫關閉。

sentences.english: There used to be dirty pool here.
The impeller and volute is the primary hydrodynamic parts, which influence the no clogging of sewage pump.
sentences.chinese: 葉輪和壓水室是影響污水泵無堵塞性的主要水力部件。

sentences.english: The plunger released the waste and also sealed the soil pipe.
sentences.chinese: 柱塞釋放污物，也封住污水管。

sentences.english: Through urine, the chemical found its way into the Po and the sewerage system.
sentences.chinese: 通過尿液，這種化學物質進入波河和污水處理系統。

sentences.english: The importance of scenery designing in city sewage disposal place was discoursed.
sentences.chinese: 論述景觀設計在市政污水處理場建設中的重要性。

sentences.english: Denitrification is always the focus in wastewater treatment industry.
sentences.chinese: 脫氮一直是污水處理界的研究熱點。

sentences.english: Runoff and tidal range are the main factors influencing the effects of dilution and dispersion.
sentences.chinese: 逕流和潮差是影響污水稀釋擴散效果的主要因素。

sentences.english: Through the diversion canal to prevent water pollution, the movie completely solve the district's sewage discharge problem.
sentences.chinese: 通過引渠治污，徹底解決該片區生活污水的排放難題。

sentences.english: The effect of oxidation-flocculation technology in enhanced treatment of municipal sewage was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氧化偶合絮凝技術強化處理城市污水的性能。

sentences.english: There exists no practical engineering instance of treating the methanol-containing waste water of gas field.
sentences.chinese: 氣田含甲醇污水處理目前國內尚沒有工程實例。

sentences.english: Children gathered around a truck as it dumped water in a trash dump near Cité Soleil.
sentences.chinese: 日光城附近，兒童聚集在一輛傾倒污水的卡車旁。

sentences.english: In this design, the oxidize ditch handling of carrousel model is used.
sentences.chinese: 本設計中，採用氧化卡羅塞溝處理該城市污水。
